items.title: Land Legend of Zelda: Echoes of Wisdom at nearly 25% off, more Switch 2 game deals
items.summary:
Alongside the batch of discounted first-party switch 2 games we featured yesterday – they are still live and you’ll find them below, Woot has now brought back its deal on 2024’s The Legend of Zelda: Echoes of Wisdom for Switch. One of the more unique Zelda experiences Nintendo has ever released, you can take control the namesake princess herself in this one down at $45.99 Prime shipped(a $6 delivery fee will apply otherwise). Regularly $60, this is nearly 25% off and a first-party Switch game that rarely goes on sale outside of these Woot offers. As mentioned above, you can scope out the ongoing Switch 2 game deals below:

  • Donkey Kong Bananza $62 (Reg. $70)
  • Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild – Switch 2 Edition $63 (Reg. $70)
  • Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom – Switch 2 Edition $70 (Reg. $80)
  • Mario Kart World $70 (Reg. $80)

  • Super Mario Party Jamboree – Switch 2 Edition + Jamboree TV $70 (Reg. $80)

amFilm Auto-Alignment Nintendo Switch 2 Screen Protector 2-pack

Buy for $5 (Reg. $9)

Enter promo code 3ERSOE5T for $2.23 off.

What we love

amFilm has been a go-to brand for affordable and reliable screen protectors for all kinds of devices. The set highlighted here is designed for the latest Switch 2 handheld with a 7.9-inch display and includes two protectors. At just $2.50 apiece, it’s hard to argue against the value here, and you might want to stock up a pair of these as spare units just in case.
